description:
Full Name: Nemesis La Algol
Gargoyle is the main antagonist. He is head of the Neo-Atlantean forces. He was the prime minister of Tartessos, and his main objectives are:
Destroy Nemo and the Nautilus,
Take possession of the Blue Waters
Dominate over the entire world and humans, whom he considers inferior.
He is a cunning yet brutal villain who speaks in a soft voice and taps into other people`s weaknesses to make them comply with his wishes. We never see the face behind the mask until the final episode (and even then, his face is only briefly shown before he dies).
His name is also a mix of Latin and Greek mythology, as for Nemo and Electra.
He considers himself an Atlantean, but he is not aware of the fact that he is one of the humans that he despises, as the mere creation of the Atlantean technology.
name: Nemesis La Algol
